derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (originally US, denoting a machine for making counterfeit money): of unknown origin

entry.def: If you describe something as bogus, you mean that it is not genuine.

example.ex: He said these figures were bogus and totally inaccurate.
example.tran: 他说这些数字都是捏造的，完全不准确。

auth_sentence.content: I guess this is bogus in you reality world.

sentences.cn: 她被他的假身份证骗了。

sentences.en: The telegram turned out to have been bogus.
